sense.name: moving through water
sense.commentary: Moving through water, usually as a sport. Not a one-time event, but an activity or process.
sense.examples: I got into USA Swimming in high school. Swimming is good exercise. John was a swimming official at the Olympics. I studied the swimming of fish for a biology project. Is the swimming of the chemical blob a goal-oriented behavior?

sense.name: specific act of swimming
sense.commentary: SWIMMING[+event] A specific act of swimming, as a one-time event. Can be bounded by time.
sense.examples: This trophy commemorates the first swimming of the English Channel. The swimming of the race will occur at noon, and it will take approximately three minutes.
